Reviews.Title: Thank Goodness it's out of stock
Reviews.Author: Sharon Leigh Horney "Lost in Translation"
Reviews.Content: My son got this for his 12th birthday and it's a shame that it's no more than a play toy fit for a 2 year old to pretend to take pictures with. It looses the pictures constantly and the drivers are not all on the tiny diskette. Looking online the web site for Sakar does not have the divers either and there is no customer support at all.Only buy this as a toy for a 2 year old if it is marked down to $5.00 or less - NOT AS A REAL CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: not great
Reviews.Author: bellablack1
Reviews.Content: got this thinking it would be a good to use to take pictures but wasn't it was no more then a child's toy the pictures were very crappy wouldn't recommend for older children

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: rssoccer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 7-year old son for his birthday to give him something to play around with.  After reading the reviews, I didn't have high hopes for it, but thought I would take a gamble since it was intended to be a first camera.  After getting it, we turned it on once and took a few pictures and loaded them on the computer.  After that, the camera never turned back on.  We tried replacing batteries, but with no results.  So in short, the camera only lasted a day.  Like the other reviews say, there is no real memory.  So if the batteries come out or run out, the images on the camera will be gone.

Reviews.Title: Broke easy
Reviews.Author: Valerie Craig
Reviews.Content: Hard for kids to take picture. it was a waste of money. Would not buy this camera again.  These surveys want to many words

Reviews.Title: didnt work
Reviews.Author: Karla Mata
Reviews.Content: the software didnt work. so my child couldnt download any pictures. screen went fuzzy right away, not enough memory to take more than 10 pictures

Reviews.Title: Not worth really
Reviews.Author: Melanie Billiu
Reviews.Content: My son go this for christmas, and it is cheap and not worth even buying.  I got it for him because he loves star wars, but the pictures are very crappy

ProductInfo.Features:
3-in1 Digital Camera
CD-ROM Software
3 Changing Face Plates
VGA Resolution 640 X 480, Uses 2 AAA Batteries (Not Included)
Can be Used as a Web Cam
ProductInfo.Name: Sakar 92022 VGA Digital Camera - Star Wars - Digital camera - compact - 0.3 Mpix
